name: Blackjack (itch) (gmoreci32)
description:
Minimum bet is 5.

Click on the chip within the "Betting Circle" and type in the amount you would like to bet; then hit the "Enter" key.

You initially start with 1000 chips.

If you have 4 or less total chips, then you can get 100 free chips.

Total chips are saved on the local machine; this means that the game will save your total chips, even after closing the browser/restarting your computer.

Side Note:

After finishing a split hand, click on the left chip to bet again.

Disclaimer: I do not own any of the sprites/images used in this game; I simply found, edited, and implemented images spread throughout the web.
